fields.name: DefaultConsistencyLevel
fields.description: The default consistency level and configuration settings of the Cosmos DB account.

fields.name: MaxIntervalInSeconds
fields.description: When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the time amount of staleness (in seconds) tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 5 - 86400. Required when defaultConsistencyPolicy is set to 'BoundedStaleness'.

fields.name: MaxStalenessPrefix
fields.description: When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the number of stale requests tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 1 â€“ 2,147,483,647. Required when defaultConsistencyPolicy is set to 'BoundedStaleness'.
